original_text: Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his finger and put it on Joseph’s finger. He dressed him in robes of fine linen and put a gold chain around his neck.
korean_text: 자기의 인장 반지를 빼어 요셉의 손에 끼우고 그에게 세마포 옷을 입히고 금 사슬을 목에 걸고

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his finger
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 바로가 그의 손가락에서 인장 반지를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and put it on Joseph's finger
He dressed him in robes of fine linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그에게 고급 린넨 옷을 입혀주었습니다

sentences.original_text: and put a gold chain around his neck
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 목에 금 목걸이를 씌워주었습니다
